Hair Clip with LED Lights: A hair clip with built-in LED lights that can be charged via a USB cable. This can be or a fun addition to any outfit.
Hair Clip with Built-in Speaker: A hair clip with a built-in speaker that can be used to listen to music or take calls hands-free.
Hair Clip with Fingerprint Scanner: A hair clip with a built-in fingerprint scanner that can be used to unlock your phone or other devices.
Hair Clip with LED Mirror: A hair clip with a built-in LED mirror that can be used to check your makeup or hair before leaving the house.
Hair Clip with Wireless Charging: A hair clip with wireless charging capabilities that can be charged using a Qi charging pad.
